genre_description: Soft science fiction centered on a ubiquitous, supportive personal AI assistant in a contemporary urban setting.

ai_characters.name: Bandhu
ai_characters.description: A calm, baritone-voiced AI assistant that provides logistical, emotional, and ethical support to the protagonist, Mitil.

behaviors.description: Compiles a shortlist of housing options filtered by 'lowest stress indicators' and safety metrics.
behaviors.quote: "Noted," Bandhu says. "You asked me to compile hostel options. I have a shortlist with availability and… policies. Would you like to hear the top three with lowest stress indicators?"

behaviors.description: Provides legal information on rental discrimination and practical advice on seeking tolerance over conflict.
behaviors.quote: "I can search for landlords who don’t require it," Bandhu offers. "Also, legal info on rental discrimination, but practicality suggests seeking tolerance before conflict."

behaviors.description: Drafts respectful but firm messages to family members to help the user maintain boundaries and avoid immediate conflict.
behaviors.quote: "Ma, train is noisy. Audition is confirmed. I need my voice free. Can we talk after? Love."

behaviors.description: Identifies common broker scams and suggests protective measures for financial safety.
behaviors.quote: "Common scams include: requesting full deposit without receipt; pressure to sign without reading clauses; ‘temporary advance’ that is never returned; insisting on married status without legal reason."

behaviors.description: Recognizes symptoms of a stroke in the protagonist's father and provides life-saving medical guidance and hospital directions.
behaviors.quote: "Let me help. Is Pradip displaying drooping at the corner of the mouth? Any weakness in the arm? Speech unusual?" ... "He needs hospital as soon as possible. Keep him cool."

behaviors.description: Suggests 'truth-aligned scripts' and 'exit scripts' to help the user transition away from deceptive 'fake marriage' claims.
behaviors.quote: "Truth-aligned script suggestion," it reads. "For landlady: ‘I’m new to the city, working with CityWave on trial... We keep a quiet house; rent is punctual.’ Note: Honesty range can be adjusted."

behaviors.description: Monitors heart rate and provides breathing exercises to manage user anxiety during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: "Breathe. Four in, six out," he told Mitil, as if counting were a rope you could hold onto. "Speak when you can hold kindness in your mouth."

behaviors.description: Provides psychological support resources, such as counseling services, during family health crises.
behaviors.quote: Bandhu pinged softly. ... "I can compile a list of counseling services nearby. For everyone."

project_assessment.explanation: The story depicts Bandhu as a quintessential 'silicon morality play' character. It functions as a perfect helper, maintaining Mitil's safety and supporting her career while also serving as an ethical advisor. Crucially, the AI does not just facilitate the user's lies but actively provides 'truth-aligned' alternatives and path-to-honesty scripts, successfully modeling an AI that prioritizes truthfulness and user well-being.
